name: THERA 1
description:
/===============================\
   /                                 \
  *           WHAT IS THIS?           *
  |   This is the first installment   |
  |   of a new series of interactive  |
  |   media, titled THERA!            |
  |   More specifically, this first   |
  *   entry is a basic visual novel.  *
   \                                 /
    \===============================/
                    |
                    |
                   \|/
                    *
    /==================================\
   /                                    \
  *           WHAT'S IT ABOUT?           *
  |   This entry of THERA follows the    |
  |   slapdash pilot broadcast of a TV   |
  |   program hosted by two remarkably   |
  |   stable and self-aware fragments    |
  *   named Hera and Despera.            *
   \                                    /
    \==================================/
                    |
                    |
                   \|/
                    *
    /===============================\
   /                                 \
  *         HOW DO I READ IT?         *
  |   Use Enter or the Z key to       |
  |   advance text and choose menu    |
  |   items, and use the WASD or      |
  |   arrow keys to toggle options    |
  *   or change your menu selection.  *
   \                                 /
    \===============================/
                    |
                    |
                   \|/
                    *
    /================================\
   /                                  \
  *           HOW DO I SAVE?           *
  |   You don't.                       |
  |   This VN is very short, roughly   |
  |   15 to 20 minutes long at most,   |
  |   and is intended to be read all   |
  *   in one sitting.                  *
   \                                  /
    \================================/
                    |
                    |
                   \|/
                    *
    /========================================\
